thread.title: The Arrangement Cast Weighs In on the Premiere's Sex, Scandals and $10 Million Contract
thread.title_full: The Arrangement Cast Weighs In on the Premiere's Sex, Scandals and $10 Million Contract

title: The Arrangement Cast Weighs In on the Premiere's Sex, Scandals and $10 Million Contract
text:
The Arrangement Cast Weighs In on the Premiere's Sex, Scandals and $10 Million Contract By Email 
Welcome to the big leagues. 
Megan Morrison ( Christine Evangelista ) received the opportunity of a lifetime in tonight's juicy series premiere of The Arrangement . Following a chance audition with mega movie star Kyle West ( Josh Henderson ), the waitress and struggling actress was offered a $10 million contract to marry the world's most eligible bachelor. Oh, and did we mention this was only after one night spent together in Mexico? Talk about chemistry! 
However, Megan's whirlwind romance won't be without its fair share of drama, especially with Kyle's intense best friend and mentor, Terrence Anderson ( Michael Vartan ), calling the shots. Because when he's not running the Institute for the Higher Mind, Terrence is busy controlling Kyle's personal life and career. Watch 
Celebs Reveal Who They Would Have an Arrangement With 
But despite all potential red flags, Megan eventually signs on the dotted line and buckles up for a wild ride in the spotlight complete with instant fame, glamour, parties and...secrets. 
Get the inside scoop on the episode in the exclusive Postnup recap video above as the The Arrangement 's cast and creator Jonathan Abrahams break down the night's biggest twists and turns! Watch the series premiere of The Arrangement this Sunday at 10 p.m., only on E! TAGS/ Shows , The Arrangement , E! Shows , Recaps , Top Stories Additional
